blocks.name: pmltpc
blocks.content: Any function on the reals is either increasing, decreasing, or has a triple of points in a vee formation. (This theorem was created on demand by Mario Carneiro for the 6PCM conference in Bialystok, 1-Jul-2014.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ivthlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ ivth . The set ` S ` of all ` x ` values with ` ( F `` x ) ` less than ` U ` is lower bounded by ` A ` and upper bounded by ` B ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ivthlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c2))))

  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cicc, c2), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, co(c4, ccncf, cc)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cicc, c2))), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c5, c0), clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c5, c2))))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s1, co(c0, cicc, c2), wbr(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), cle, c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c4)

  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c2)))), wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cicc, c2), c4)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c2)))), wi(w0, wcel(c5, co(c4, ccncf, cc))))

blocks.name: ivthlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ ivth . Show that the supremum of ` S ` cannot be less than ` U ` . If it was, continuity of ` F ` implies that there are points just above the supremum that are also less than ` U ` , a contradiction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ivthlem2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, c2)))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c5, ccncf, cc)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cicc, c4))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c0, c3), clt, c2), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c0, c4))))
  -| wceq(c6, crab(s0, co(c3, cicc, c4), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, csup(c6, cr, clt))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm2.01da(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, c2))
  mpd(wa(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, c2)), wn(wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, c2)), wrex(hs1, crp, wral(hs0, c5, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c0, c1))), clt, co(c2, cmin, cfv(c0, c1)))))))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, c2)), wrex(hs1, crp, wral(hs0, c5, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c0, c1))), clt, co(c2, cmin, cfv(c0, c1)))))), wcel(c0, co(c5, ccncf, cc)), wcel(c1, c5), wcel(co(c2, cmin, cfv(c0, c1)), crp))
  adantr(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, c2), wcel(c0, co(c5, ccncf, cc)))
  adantr(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, c2), wcel(c1, c5))
  sseldd(c1, c5, co(c3, cicc, c4), w0)

blocks.name: ivthlem3
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ ivth , the intermediate value theorem. Show that ` ( F `` C ) ` cannot be greater than ` U ` , and so establish the existence of a root of the function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)

blocks.content: The intermediate value theorem, increasing case. This is Metamath 100 proof #79. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 22-Jan-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2014.)

thm ivth(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c4, ccncf, cc)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cicc, c1))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  syl(w0, wrex(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)), wa(wcel(csup(crab(hs0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)), cr, clt), co(c0, cioo, c1)), wceq(cfv(c2, csup(crab(hs0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)), cr, clt)), c3)))
  ivthlem3(s1, csup(crab(hs0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)), cr, clt), c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, crab(hs0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)), w0)
  cbvrabv(hs0, s1, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c3), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cle, c3))
  breq1d(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c3, cfv(c2, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s1), c2)
  eqid(csup(crab(hs0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)), cr, clt))
  rspcev(s0, csup(crab(hs0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)), cr, clt), co(c0, cioo, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, csup(crab(hs0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)), cr, clt)), c3), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3))
  fveqeq2(cv(s0), csup(crab(hs0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)), cr, clt), c2, c3)
  diff.csup.s(s1, crab(hs0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)), cr, clt)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.crab.s(s1, hs0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c3))

  diff.csup.s(s0, crab(hs0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)), cr, clt)

thm ivth(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈(c0[(,)]c1),(c2 ` s0)= c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[<]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0[[,]]c1)⊆ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(c4[-cn->]ℂ))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈(c0[[,]]c1))→(c2 ` s1)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →((c2 ` c0)[<]c3 ∧ c3[<](c2 ` c1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → ∃(s0 ∈(c0[(,)]c1),(c2 ` s0)= c3)), d(s0, s1))
  a1ii((w0 → ∃(s0 ∈(c0[(,)]c1),(c2 ` s0)= c3)), d(s0, c4))
  a1ii((w0 → ∃(s0 ∈(c0[(,)]c1),(c2 ` s0)= c3)), d(s0, w0))
  syl(w0, ∃(s0 ∈(c0[(,)]c1),(c2 ` s0)= c3), (sup({ hs0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)|(c2 ` hs0)[≤]c3 }, ℝ, <)∈(c0[(,)]c1)∧(c2 ` sup({ hs0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)|(c2 ` hs0)[≤]c3 }, ℝ, <))= c3))
  ivthlem3(s1, sup({ hs0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)|(c2 ` hs0)[≤]c3 }, ℝ, <), c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, { hs0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)|(c2 ` hs0)[≤]c3 }, w0)
  cbvrabv(hs0, s1, (c0[[,]]c1), (c2 ` hs0)[≤]c3, (c2 ` s1)[≤]c3)
  breq1d((c2 ` hs0), cle, c3, (c2 ` s1), hs0 = s1)
  fveq2(hs0, s1, c2)
  eqid(sup({ hs0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)|(c2 ` hs0)[≤]c3 }, ℝ, <))
  rspcev(s0, sup({ hs0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)|(c2 ` hs0)[≤]c3 }, ℝ, <), (c0[(,)]c1), (c2 ` sup({ hs0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)|(c2 ` hs0)[≤]c3 }, ℝ, <))= c3, (c2 ` s0)= c3)
  fveqeq2(s0, sup({ hs0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)|(c2 ` hs0)[≤]c3 }, ℝ, <), c2, c3)
  diff.csup.s(s1, { hs0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)|(c2 ` hs0)[≤]c3 }, cr, clt)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.crab.s(s1, hs0, (c0[[,]]c1), (c2 ` hs0)[≤]c3)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[[,]]c1))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cicc, c1)

  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cioo, c1)
  diff.cioo.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (c2 ` sup({ hs0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)|(c2 ` hs0)[≤]c3 }, ℝ, <)), c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, sup({ hs0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)|(c2 ` hs0)[≤]c3 }, ℝ, <))
  diff.csup.s(s0, { hs0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)|(c2 ` hs0)[≤]c3 }, cr, clt)

  mpbid(w0, wrex(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)), wrex(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c4, cneg(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), cv(s0)), cneg(c3))))

  negeqd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))

  renegcld(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cicc, c1))))
  jca(w0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c4, cneg(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), c0), clt, cneg(c3)), wbr(cneg(c3), clt, cfv(cmpt(hs0, c4, cneg(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), c1)))
  eqbrtrd(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c4, cneg(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), c0), clt, cneg(c3), cneg(cfv(c2, c0)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c4, cneg(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), c0), cneg(cfv(c2, c0))), wcel(c0, c4))
  sseldd(c0, c4, co(c0, cicc, c1), w0)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, c4, cmpt(hs0, c4, cneg(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), cneg(cfv(c2, c0)), cneg(cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))
  negeqd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  simprd(w0, wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c0)), wbr(cfv(c2, c1), clt, c3))

  mpbid(w0, wbr(cneg(c3), clt, cneg(cfv(c2, c1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c1), clt, c3))

thm ivth2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈(c0[(,)]c1),(c2 ` s0)= c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[<]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0[[,]]c1)⊆ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(c4[-cn->]ℂ))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈(c0[[,]]c1))→(c2 ` s1)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →((c2 ` c1)[<]c3 ∧ c3[<](c2 ` c0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, ∃(s0 ∈(c0[(,)]c1),(c2 ` s0)= c3), ∃(s0 ∈(c0[(,)]c1),((hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0)))` s0)= -u(c3)))
  ivth(s0, s1, c0, c1, (hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0))), -u(c3), c4, w0)
  renegcld(c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0)))∈(c4[-cn->]ℂ), c2 ∈(c4[-cn->]ℂ))
  negfcncf(hs0, c2, c4, (hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0))))
  eqeltrd(((hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0)))` s1), cr, -u((c2 ` s1)), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)))
  syl((w0 ∧ s1 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)), ((hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0)))` s1)= -u((c2 ` s1)), s1 ∈ c4)
  sselda(s1, (c0[[,]]c1), c4, w0)
  fvmpt(hs0, s1, c4, (hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0))), -u((c2 ` s1)), -u((c2 ` hs0)))
  negeqd((c2 ` hs0), (c2 ` s1), hs0 = s1)
  fveq2(hs0, s1, c2)
  negex((c2 ` s1))
  renegcld((c2 ` s1), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)))
  jca(w0, ((hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0)))` c0)[<]-u(c3), -u(c3)[<]((hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0)))` c1))
  eqbrtrd(((hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0)))` c0), clt, -u(c3), -u((c2 ` c0)), w0)
  syl(w0, ((hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0)))` c0)= -u((c2 ` c0)), c0 ∈ c4)
  sseldd(c0, c4, (c0[[,]]c1), w0)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, c4, (hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0))), -u((c2 ` c0)), -u((c2 ` hs0)))
  negeqd((c2 ` hs0), (c2 ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, c2)
  negex((c2 ` c0))
  mpbid(w0, -u((c2 ` c0))[<]-u(c3), c3[<](c2 ` c0))
  simprd(w0, c3[<](c2 ` c0), (c2 ` c1)[<]c3)
  ltnegd(c3, (c2 ` c0), w0)
  rspcdva(s1, c0, (c0[[,]]c1), w0, (c2 ` c0)∈ ℝ, (c2 ` s1)∈ ℝ)
  eleq1d((c2 ` s1), cr, (c2 ` c0), s1 = c0)
  fveq2(s1, c0, c2)
  syl3anc(w0, c0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1), c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ*, c0[≤]c1)
  lbicc2(c0, c1)
  breqtrrd(-u(c3), clt, ((hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0)))` c1), -u((c2 ` c1)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, -u(c3)[<]-u((c2 ` c1)), (c2 ` c1)[<]c3)
  simpld(w0, (c2 ` c1)[<]c3, c3[<](c2 ` c0))
  ltnegd((c2 ` c1), c3, w0)
  rspcdva(s1, c1, (c0[[,]]c1), w0, (c2 ` c1)∈ ℝ, (c2 ` s1)∈ ℝ)
  eleq1d((c2 ` s1), cr, (c2 ` c1), s1 = c1)
  fveq2(s1, c1, c2)
  ralrimiva(s1, (c0[[,]]c1), w0, (c2 ` s1)∈ ℝ)
  syl(w0, ((hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0)))` c1)= -u((c2 ` c1)), c1 ∈ c4)
  sseldd(c1, c4, (c0[[,]]c1), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, c1 ∈(c0[[,]]c1), c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ*, c0[≤]c1)
  rexrd(c0, w0)
  rexrd(c1, w0)
  ltled(c0, c1, w0)
  ubicc2(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, c4, (hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0))), -u((c2 ` c1)), -u((c2 ` hs0)))
  negeqd((c2 ` hs0), (c2 ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, c2)
  negex((c2 ` c1))
  rexbidva(s0, (c0[(,)]c1), w0, ((hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0)))` s0)= -u(c3), (c2 ` s0)= c3)
  bitrd((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[(,)]c1)), ((hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0)))` s0)= -u(c3), (c2 ` s0)= c3, -u((c2 ` s0))= -u(c3))
  eqeq1d(((hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0)))` s0), -u(c3), -u((c2 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[(,)]c1)))
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[(,)]c1)), ((hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0)))` s0)= -u((c2 ` s0)), s0 ∈ c4)
  fvmpt(hs0, s0, c4, (hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0))), -u((c2 ` s0)), -u((c2 ` hs0)))
  negeqd((c2 ` hs0), (c2 ` s0), hs0 = s0)
  fveq2(hs0, s0, c2)
  eqid((hs0 ∈ c4 ↦ -u((c2 ` hs0))))
  negex((c2 ` s0))
  neg11ad((c2 ` s0), c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[(,)]c1)))
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈(c0[(,)]c1), (c2 ` s0)∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ c4)
  sselda(s0, (c0[(,)]c1), c4, w0)
  syl5ss((c0[(,)]c1), c4, (c0[[,]]c1), w0)
  ioossicc(c0, c1)
  ffvelrnda(s0, c4, c2, cc, w0)
  syl(w0, (c2 : c4 → ℂ), c2 ∈(c4[-cn->]ℂ))
  cncff(c2, c4, cc)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(c0[(,)]c1), c3 ∈ ℂ)
  recnd(c3, w0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs0, c4, -u((c2 ` hs0)))
  diff.cneg.s(s0, (c2 ` hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, c3)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, hs0, c4, -u((c2 ` hs0)))
  diff.cneg.s(s1, (c2 ` hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(-u((c2 ` s1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(-u((c2 ` c0)))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cicc, c1)
  diff.cicc.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, (c2 ` c0), cr)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, (c2 ` c1), cr)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, c1)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(-u((c2 ` c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(-u((c2 ` s0)))
}

thm ivthle(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c4, ccncf, cc)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cicc, c1))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, cfv(c2, c1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpjaodan(w0, wrex(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, c3), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), c3))
  mpjaodan(wa(w0, wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, c3)), wrex(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c1)), wceq(c3, cfv(c2, c1)))
  anassrs(w0, wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c1)), wrex(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)))
  mpsyl(wa(w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c1)))), wrex(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)), wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wrex(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)))
  ioossicc(c0, c1)
  ivth(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, wa(w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c1)))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c1))), wcel(c0, cr))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c1))), wcel(c1, cr))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c1))), wcel(c3, cr))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c1))), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c1))), wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), c4))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c1))), wcel(c2, co(c4, ccncf, cc)))

thm ivthle2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)))

  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c4, ccncf, cc)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cicc, c1))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c1), cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, cfv(c2, c0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)

  -| diffsw(s1, w0)

  mpjaodan(w0, wrex(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)), wbr(cfv(c2, c1), clt, c3), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), c3))

  adantlr(w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c1), clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cr))
  simpr(w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c1), clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c0))))
  ssrexv(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c0, cicc, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3))

  syl5bb(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(c3, cfv(c2, c0)), wceq(c3, cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  eqcom(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)
  eqeq2d(c3, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, c0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))

  eleq1d(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cr, cfv(c2, c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  fveq2(cv(s1), c0, c2)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(c0, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  lbicc2(c0, c1)

  rspcev(s0, c1, co(c0, cicc, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), c3), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3))

  simpld(w0, wbr(cfv(c2, c1), cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, cfv(c2, c0)))
  leloed(cfv(c2, c1), c3, w0)
  rspcdva(s1, c1, co(c0, cicc, c1), w0, wcel(cfv(c2, c1), cr), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cr))
  eleq1d(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cr, cfv(c2, c1), wceq(cv(s1), c1))

  diff.wa.s(s0, wbr(cfv(c2, c1), clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c0)))

  diff.wbr.s(s0, c3, clt, cfv(c2, c0))
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c1), clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, cfv(c2, c0))))

blocks.name: ivthicc
blocks.content: The interval between any two points of a continuous real function is contained in the range of the function. Equivalently, the range of a continuous real function is convex. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ivthicc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2)), crn(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c3, cicc, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c3, cicc, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(co(c3, cicc, c4), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c5, ccncf, cc)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cicc, c4))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2)), crn(c0), w0)
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)))
  mpjao3dan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wceq(c1, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  sylc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2)))), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), w0, wrex(hs1, co(c1, cicc, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  ivthle(hs1, s0, c1, c2, c0, cv(hs0), c5, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2)))), wbr(c1, clt, c2)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2))), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wcel(c1, cr))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2))), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wcel(c2, cr))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2)))), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2)))), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2))), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wss(co(c1, cicc, c2), c5))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2))), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wcel(c0, co(c5, ccncf, cc)))
  sylan(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2)))), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr), w0)
  simpll(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2))), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cicc, c4)))
  sselda(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2), co(c3, cicc, c4), w0)
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2)))), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wa(wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, c2))))
  rexlimdva(hs1, co(c1, cicc, c2), w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)))

  sselda(cv(hs1), co(c1, cicc, c2), c5, w0)
  sstrd(co(c1, cicc, c2), c5, co(c3, cicc, c4), w0)

  eleqtrd(cv(hs0), csn(cfv(c0, c1)), co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0, c1), cicc, cfv(c0, c2)))), wceq(c1, c2)))

blocks.name: evthicc
blocks.content: Specialization of the Extreme Value Theorem to a closed interval of ` RR ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm evthicc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wrex(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wral(s1, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wrex(s2, co(c0, cicc, c1), wral(s3, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cle, cfv(c2, cv(s3)))))))

} = {
  jca(w0, wrex(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), wral(s1, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wrex(s2, co(c0, cicc, c1), wral(s3, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cle, cfv(c2, cv(s3))))))

  eqid(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c1))))

  oveq1d(cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c1)))), ccn, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), crest, co(c0, cicc, c1)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c1)))), co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), crest, co(c0, cicc, c1))), wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cr))
  resubmet(co(c0, cicc, c1), cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c1)))), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))

  rexeqbidv(s2, co(c0, cicc, c1), cuni(co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), crest, co(c0, cicc, c1))), w0, wral(s3, co(c0, cicc, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cle, cfv(c2, cv(s3)))), wral(s3, cuni(co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), crest, co(c0, cicc, c1))), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cle, cfv(c2, cv(s3)))))

blocks.content: A continuous function on a closed interval is bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.)
